channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump hikes tariffs on Canada to 35%, announces rates from 10% to 40% for dozens of countries
CEO Tim Cook says Apple ready to open its wallet to catch up in AI
Jim Cramer Calls United Parcel Service Stock’s Plunge “Frightening”

item.description: "Person to Person" with Norah O'Donnell brings viewers the most intimate type of interview — going beyond the headlines through thoughtful conversatio...

item.title: "48 Hours" Presents: Love and Death in Alaska [Part 2]
item.description: Is Mechele Linehan a conniving ex-stripper who should be in jail for murder, or was she unfairly targeted by police because of a past life? Susan Spen...

item.title: UCLA set to lose some of its federal research funding: Officials
item.description: UCLA has been notified that it will be losing some of its federal research funding over claims of “antisemitism and bias,” according to the school’s c...

item.title: Trump unveils sweeping tariffs in 'new system of trade'
item.description: President Donald Trump signed an executive order Thursday, slapping tariffs on most of America's trading partners set to take effect next week.

item.title: Canadian wildfire smoke chokes Midwest as flood threat looms in Carolinas
item.description: A total of 1 to 4 inches of rain fell across the I-95 corridor on Thursday, leading to numerous flash flood warnings.

item.title: Investigators to wrap up public hearings into fatal midair crash between Army chopper and airplane
item.description: The National Transportation Safety Board will wrap up its public testimony on Friday about the fatal midair crash between an Army helicopter and a com...

item.title: 7/31: The Daily Report
item.description: Jo Ling Kent reports on the upcoming deadline for sweeping tariffs, and what new data tells us about ICE arrests under President Trump so far.

item.title: Prosecutors seeking long prison term for Sean "Diddy" Combs and opposing bail
item.description: Prosecutors say they now expect music mogul Sean "Diddy" Combs could face a prison sentence "substantially higher" than the four-to-five years they on...

item.title: Trump unveils higher tariffs on dozens of countries
item.description: The Trump administration is poised to hit dozens of nations around the world with higher tariffs starting next week.

item.title: A Texas researcher was held at an airport for over a week. Now he faces deportation
Sen. Elizabeth Warren falls on Senate floor as Republicans offer bipartisan assistance during Israel vote
WATCH: Supersized stick insect discovered in Australia
item.description: Scientists in Australia have discovered a giant new species of stick insect, which is over 15 inches long.

item.title: Rural Texas county’s top leaders were asleep, out of town during initial hours of flood crisis
Judge blocks Trump administration from ending protections for 60,000 from Central America and Nepal
WATCH: New York City Mayor Eric Adams speaks at NYPD officer's funeral
item.description: New York City Mayor Eric Adams spoke about his visit with late officer Didarul Islam’s father, and the pain of parents having to bury their children.
